/bin/g++ -fPIC  -std=c++17 -pthread -lcrypto -lssl -g -shared -Wl,-soname,libchain.so -o libchain.so CMakeFiles/chain.dir/include/encryption/hash_handler.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chain.dir/include/encryption/rsa_handler.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chain.dir/include/encryption/encryption.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chain.dir/include/db/out_entry.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chain.dir/include/db/transaction.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chain.dir/include/db/block.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chain.dir/include/db/account.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chain.dir/include/db/affair.cpp.o  -lssl -lcrypto
